resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105556</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105556</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201087</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Course 4: Culture for Understanding</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kurs 4: Kultur für das Verstehen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cours 4 : Culture pour l'Arrangement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Curso 4: Cultura para compreender</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Corso 4: Coltura per capire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σειρά μαθημάτων 4: Πολιτισμός για την κατανόηση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Curso 4: Cultura para entender</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A course designed to help teachers reach all students and to depend upon diverse cultures as a source of strength for curriculum and for classroom development.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Kurs konzipierte, Lehrern zu helfen erreichen 
alle Kursteilnehmer und nach verschiedenen Kulturen als Quelle der 
Stärke für Lehrplan und für Klassenzimmerentwicklung abzuhängen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un cours a conçu pour aider des professeurs 
atteignent tous les étudiants et pour dépendre des cultures diverses
comme source de force pour le programme d'études et pour le 
développement de salle de classe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um curso projetou ajudar a professores alcança 
todos os estudantes e depender em cima das culturas diversas como uma 
fonte da força para o curriculum e para o desenvolvimento da sala de 
aula.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un corso ha progettato aiutare gli insegnanti 
raggiunge tutti gli allievi e dipendere dalle colture varie come 
sorgente di resistenza per il programma di studi e per sviluppo 
dell'aula.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια σειρά μαθημάτων με σκοπό να βοηθήσει τους 
δασκάλους να φθάσουν σε όλους τους σπουδαστές και για να 
εξαρτηθεί από τους διαφορετικούς πολιτισμούς ως πηγή δύναμης για
το πρόγραμμα σπουδών και για την ανάπτυξη τάξεων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un curso diseñó ayudar a profesores alcanza a 
todos los estudiantes y depender de culturas diversas como fuente de 
la fuerza para el plan de estudios y para el desarrollo de la sala de 
clase.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:FRED MEDNICK
FN:FRED MEDNICK
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201087</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution 2.0</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105556</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/course-4-culture-for-understanding</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
